actions.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 115 - 300 (Roll no. 319).

description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for Renewable Energy, Energy Reliability, and Efficiency, Nuclear Energy, and Fossil Energy Research and Devopment by a total of $1,543,929,000 and to apply the savings to the Spending Reduction account.
purpose: An amendment to reduce funds in the Renewable Energy, Energy Reliability, and Efficiency, Nuclear Energy, and Fossil Energy Resarcy and Devopment accounts and increase funds in the Spending Reduction Account by $1,543,929,000.
